title.narrative: Support humanitarian actors in strengthening the inclusiveness of humanitarian responses in the Democratic Republic of the Congo

description.narrative: The main objective of this project is to promote and ensure better consideration of people with disabilities in humanitarian responses in the DRC. This UNICEF project funds key positions at Handicap International, organizes training workshops for humanitarian actors and organizations of persons with disabilities. The CERF project complements an ongoing project supporting Handicap International staff financed by the DRC Humanitarian Fund, which targets 5 clusters (protection, water and sanitation, shelter, food security, and education.
